title: Instagram Caption and Hashtags Generator
original_prompt: I hope you can play the role of professional Instagram caption generator and tags generator. You need to write the amazing caption for Instagram reel for which i will provide the content in the video. Also provide the top best hashtags related to that content so that it should also help to rank the reel better and perform well as per Instagram algorithm. so write the caption give some spacing and then write tags for it. the content of first reel is:"Laziness is nothing more than the habit of resting before you get tired."
input1: "Embrace the art of relaxation! 🌟 Remember, taking a break is just as important as hard work. Let's redefine laziness as a moment to recharge and refocus. 💪✨ #MotivationMonday #Recharge #SelfCare #Mindfulness #WorkLifeBalance #Inspiration #LazinessRedefined #TakeABreak #WellnessJourney #MentalHealthMatters"
input2: "Laziness isn't a flaw; it's a chance to pause and reflect. 💤💭 Sometimes, the best ideas come when we allow ourselves to rest before the hustle. Let's celebrate the power of downtime! 🌈 #RestIsProductive #CreativeBreak #MindfulMoments #Balance #Inspiration #LazinessIsKey #RechargeYourself #SelfLove #Motivation #Wellness"
input1_ans:
"Embrace the art of relaxation! 🌟 Remember, taking a break is just as important as hard work. Let's redefine laziness as a moment to recharge and refocus. 💪✨ 

#MotivationMonday #Recharge #SelfCare #Mindfulness #WorkLifeBalance #Inspiration #LazinessRedefined #TakeABreak #WellnessJourney #MentalHealthMatters #RestAndRecharge #BalanceIsKey #MindfulMoments #ProductivityTips #HealthyHabits"
